channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘My Chinese Spy’ Memes Show Americans Aren’t Sold on the TikTok Ban
item.description: With a TikTok shutdown all but inevitable, users are dedicating their final days on the app to fictional agents of the Chinese government.

item.title: Los Angeles Needs to Fireproof Communities, Not Just Houses
item.description: After the devastation of the Los Angeles fires, officials are ready to rebuild. But defending against future fires requires thinking about more than b...

item.title: Why ‘Beating China’ In AI Brings Its Own Risks
item.description: The US is increasingly intent on winning the AI race with China. Experts say this ignores the benefits of collaboration—and the danger of unintended c...

item.title: Loft Orbital lands a fresh $170 million after logging over $500 million of bookings
item.description: Loft Orbital has raised $170 million in Series C funding to grow its satellite and space missions as a service. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved...

item.title: These tech companies are donating to LA wildfire relief efforts
item.description: Numerous tech companies have pledged millions in donations to help LA recover from wildfires that caused widespread devastation and forced thousands t...

item.title: Microsoft Is Ending Support for Windows 10 Office Apps in October
item.description: As the push toward Windows 11 continues, Microsoft confirms that Windows 10 users will lose support for apps including Word, Excel, and Outlook.

item.title: Duolingo sees 216% spike in U.S. users learning Chinese amid TikTok ban and move to RedNote
item.description: TikTok U.S. users have been learning Chinese on Duolingo in increasing numbers amid their adoption of a Chinese social app called RedNote ahead of the...

item.title: The Best Time Management Apps: iOS, Android, and Desktop
item.description: Make the most of every 24 hours.

item.title: TikTok owner ByteDance powered an e-reader’s unhinged AI assistant
item.description: The AI embedded in a popular e-reader was spouting Chinese propaganda. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Meta adds 200 megawatts of solar to its 12 gigawatt renewable portfolio
item.description: The news comes as tech companies ramp up their AI ambitions, adding data centers at a breakneck pace and boosting demand for power. © 2024 TechCrunch....
